sponsors.name: Twilio
sponsors.description: Twilio is a cloud communications platform that allows software developers to programmatically make and receive phone calls, send and receive text messages, and perform other communication funcitons using its web service APIs.

sponsors.name: Stockora
sponsors.description: Stockora is an API-first stock data and public company newswire. An official partner to the London Stock Exchange, Stockora provides low-latency data feeds and machine learning derived company insights.

sponsors.name: LexisNexis Risk Solutions
sponsors.description: LexisNexis® Risk Solutions provides data and analytics tools that assist businesses in evaluating and predicting risk and enhancing operational efﬁciency. We help our customers make better, timelier decisions and assist them in managing risks like identity theft, fraud, money laundering and terrorism, and preventing ﬁnancial crimes, and insurance and government beneﬁt scams. Harnessing the power of data, we can help those without traditional credit histories obtain access to funds, assist agencies in ﬁnding uncollected revenue, and help law enforcement to solve crimes.By bringing clarity to information, we ultimately help make communities safer, insurance rates more accurate, commerce more transparent, business decisions easier and processes more efﬁcient.
